RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Teaching researcher at the University of Roma Tre, Department of Education. Ph.D. in Information and Communication Theory from Universita Degli Studi Di Macerata (2008). Experience in Education and media, focusing on Educational Technology. Coordinator of the scientific committee of the online academic course in Education Sciences (Roma Tre). He is a member of the Audio-Visual Technics Laboratory - LTA, a unit that performs activities of research, education, production and service concerning the pedagogic-didactic use of media, with particular care to the integration of traditional and new conceptual/material tools. He deals with education and multimedia, and with the relationship among media and the general educational systems, with a particular interest in teaching and learning with digital media. His publications include Social Learning (Guerini 2014), Histria e pedagogia nos media (Annablume 2012) and Mediologia (ed., Liguori 2012).
